item.title: Downloads ---New Releases-aspose.words-for-.net-22.8-(dlls-only)
item.description: Aspose.Words for .NET 22.8 (DLLs only) Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 1 File Size: 95.36MB Date Added: 2/8/2022 Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/words/net/release-notes/2022/aspose-words-for-net-22-8-release-notes/ DescriptionThis ZIP file contains the Aspose.Words for .NET and .NET Standard 2.0 assemblies. The assemblies are the same as in the MSI installer of the product of the same version. Download this if you want to use Aspose.Words without the MSI installer, for example because you cannot run MSI installers on Mono.

item.title: Import Export AZW3 Kindle Format 8 (KF8) API C# ASP.NET Apps
item.description: Aspose.Words for .NET 22.8 Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 1 File Size: 95.34MB Date Added: 2/8/2022 Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/words/net/release-notes/2022/aspose-words-for-net-22-8-release-notes/ DescriptionIt contains Aspose.Words for .NET 22.8 MSI installer. File Details AZW3 (KF8) Format Import/Export Support This version of the API introduces the ability to import and export the AZW3, a.k.a. Kindle Format 8 (KF8) eBook format. Amazon’s KF8 (.azw3) is the next generation file format of Kindle eReaders.

The assemblies are the same as in the MSI installer of the product of the same version. Download this if you want to use Aspose.Words without the MSI installer, for example because you cannot run MSI installers on Mono.

item.title: Text Indentation in Blockquote Tags API for C#, ASP.NET Apps
item.description: Aspose.Words for .NET 22.10 Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 1 File Size: 83.6MB Date Added: 6/10/2022 Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/words/net/release-notes/2022/aspose-words-for-net-22-10-release-notes/ DescriptionIt contains Aspose.Words for .NET 22.10 MSI installer. File Details Text Indentation in blockquote Tags This API version correctly renders the text format indentation against the HTML blockquote tags. Move DocumentBuilder Cursor inside SDT Ability to move the DocumentBuilder cursor inside of a structured document tag (SDT).
